SELECT count(QUO_TB.quo_seq) FROM QUO_TB
INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = JOB_TB.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ AND JOB_TB.state != 'D'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ, sum(CHRGS) CHRGS, sum(NET_SALES) NET_SALES FROM TEST_ITEM_TB where state != 'D' group by QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ ) items ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = items.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = items.QUO_SEQ
LEFT JOIN SLS_TB ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = SLS_TB.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = SLS_TB.QUO_SEQ AND SLS_TB.state != 'D'

where 1=1
and date_format(QUO_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')

LEFT JOIN ( SELECT QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ, sum(CHRGS) CHRGS, sum(NET_SALES) NET_SALES FROM TEST_ITEM_TB where state != 'D' group by QUO_YM, QUO_SEQ ) items ON QUO_TB.QUO_YM = items.QUO_YM AND QUO_TB.quo_seq = items.QUO_SEQ
